subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The men’s and women’s singles champions will earn $1.42 million at the Australian Open, which is increasing overall prize money by 12 percent. All the extra money is going to the singles finalists, the Tennis Australia chief executive Steve Wood said in a statement Saturday. The losing singles finalists will received $706,300. The Australian Open, the first of the year’s four tennis majors, starts Jan. 19 in Melbourne.
